response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, encapsulating years of innovation and dedication. We believe its worth extends well beyond its tangible attributes, making it an unparalleled investment for those who appreciate quality and exclusivity.

We are offering this exceptional piece to you at a special price of $1,200,000, hoping to bring its unique benefits to someone who will cherish it as we have. This is a rare opportunity to acquire something truly remarkable at a discounted rate.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We are confident that you will find the product to be a valuable addition to your collection or business.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
